newsitem.title: USA: Ibah Inc to acquire clinical trial group.
newsitem.headline: Ibah Inc to acquire clinical trial group.

text.p: IBAH Inc said Tuesday it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire Hardardt Group for stock and cash.
Under the deal, IBAH will convert all of the Hardardt Group's stock into about 2.7 million shares of IBAH common stock and $14 million in cash.
Judy Hardardt, the founder and president of Hardardt Group, would become a member of IBAH's board of directors, Ibah said.
The deal was expected to close on October 1.
Hardardt Group, which is based in Parsippany, N.J., is a research organization specializing in management of clinical trials of drug development.
